thread.title: Frank T. Lavandier, PhD
thread.title_full: Avas Flowers reviewed by Frank T. Lavandier, PhD

author: Frank T. Lavandier, PhD
title: Frank T. Lavandier, PhD
text:
From the outset, my transaction with Avas Flowers in Melbourne Beach, Florida, was exemplary. The day the flower arrangement was delivered, my Aunt contacted me and said they were beautiful and made her day. I need say no more.
Satisfied customer,
Frank T. Lavandier, PhD
